CustomField.formula:
(( IF( ISNULL(Original_Close_Date_Time__c), ClosedDate,Original_Close_Date_Time__c) - Goal_Close_DT_Stamp__c ) <= 0
&&
(NOT(ISNULL(ClosedDate )) || NOT(ISNULL(Original_Close_Date_Time__c ))) )
||
( (NOT(ISNULL(ClosedDate )) || NOT(ISNULL(Original_Close_Date_Time__c )))
&&
ISNULL(Goal_Close_DT_Stamp__c ))
&&
Custom_SLA_Active__c
CustomField.label: Case Close SLA Met
